original_text: When Jacob finished commanding his sons, he drew up his feet into the bed and breathed his last and was gathered to his people.
korean_text: 야곱이 아들에게 명하기를 마치고 그 발을 침상에 모으고 숨을 거두니 그의 백성에게로 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: When Jacob finished commanding his sons
he drew up his feet into the bed
and was gathered to his people
